title: Animating a sprite from one position to another

cells.data:
CCActionMoveTo *move = [CCActionMoveTo actionWithDuration:0.5 position:ccp(self.levelOnes.position.x + self.levelOnes.boundingBox.size.width, self.levelOnes.position.y)];

[self.levelOnes runAction: move];

Code to move a sprite with a duration. This can be used for other objects as well, including obstacles that need to move into and off the screen

Appears to run in a separate thread, so can be started and forgotten.
